subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. scratched another two weeks’ worth of games, through Jan. 14, and the league’s deputy commissioner said the point of no return was “sometime in mid-January.”
snippet: The N.H.L. scratched another two weeks’ worth of games, through Jan. 14, and the league’s deputy commissioner said the point of no return was “sometime in mid-January.”
